message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: 
while (players.hasNext()){
    array[x] = new NEW();
    array[x].Firstname  = players.next();
    array[x].Lastname  = players.hasNext() ? players.next() : "";
    array[x].Position  = players.hasNext() ? players.next() : "";
    array[x].Jnum  = players.hasNext() ? players.nextInt() : 0;
    array[x].Team  = players.hasNext() ? players.next() : "";
    x++;
}
<<<explanation>>>: The NoSuchElementException is thrown by the next() method of an Iterator, to indicate that there are no more elements in the array. You should always call hasNext() before calling next() to avoid this exception. In your code, you are calling next() without checking if there is a next element in the array. You should add a check for hasNext() before each next() call.
